text:
SimplyInsured - San Francisco - https://www.simplyinsured.com/

SimplyInsured is “Kayak for Health Insurance” - we are a 100% online platform to buy small business health insurance. We are revolutionizing the $17B health insurance brokerage market. We have dozens of delighted customers, are generating revenue, and are backed by YCombinator and some of silicon valley’s top entrepreneurs and investors.

We are looking for Full Stack Hackers.

https://www.simplyinsured.com/jobs
